    • Method Detail

      • getHint

        @Nullable
public TextSource getHint()
        Get the hint. The text will be shown in the text field until it receives focus.
        Returns:
        TextSource for the hint or null.

      • setHint

        public void setHint(@Nullable
           TextSource hint)
        Set the hint.
        Parameters:
        hint - the hint.

      • setHintText

        public void setHintText(@Nullable
               LocalizedText hintText)
        Set the hint text. The text will be shown in the text field until it receives focus. You can only have a hint text key or a hint text set - not both. Setting one clears the other.
        Parameters:
        hintText - the text to set.

      • setHintTextKey

        public void setHintTextKey(@Nullable
                  LocalizedObjectKey hintTextKey)
        Set the hint text key. The text will be shown in the text field until it receives focus. You can only have a hint text key or a hint text set - not both. Setting one clears the other.
        Parameters:
        hintTextKey - the text key to set.
